description:
Continuous Integration/Continuous Delivery (CI/CD) software – meaning solutions that teams use to build, test, and deploy applications – has come a long way over the past decade. Whereas organisations once cobbled together CI/CD pipelines using disparate open source tools, they now have a plethora of end-to-end, vendor-supported enterprise CI/CD platforms that they can use instead.... Read more »

The post Best practices for CI/CD migration: The GitHub Enterprise example appeared first on Developer Tech News.
title: Best practices for CI/CD migration: The GitHub Enterprise example
